please_wait: Please wait while we process your request.
tagline: On the way to a better career

toast.save_error_description: Something went wrong while saving your data.
toast.save_success_description: Your data has been saved successfully.
toast.load_error_description: Something went wrong while loading the data.
toast.contact_support: Contact support if this problem persists.
toast.already_exists_description: You have already created a search profile. You will be redirected to the download page.
toast.answers_saved_description: Your search profile answers have been saved successfully.
toast.download_started_description: Your search profile download has started.
toast.download_failed_description: Something went wrong while downloading your search profile.
toast.report_already_generated_description: You already have a career report. You will be redirected to the download page.
toast.report_already_exists_description: You have already generated a career report. You will be redirected to the download page.
toast.extra_info_saved_description: Now you can set your priorities.
toast.fill_all_fields_description: Fill in all questions before continuing.
toast.select_minimum_keywords_description: You must select at least 5 items before you can complete.
toast.profile_completed_description: Your report is now being automatically generated. You will be redirected to the report page.
toast.completion_error_description: Something went wrong while completing your profile. Please try again.
toast.no_user_data: Cannot find user data for sending data.
toast.wensberoepen_incomplete_description: Fill in all dream job fields before completing the scan.
toast.wensberoepen_completed: Your dream jobs scan has been successfully completed and the data has been sent.
toast.profile_completing: Profile being completed and report generated...

view_only_mode.title: You are viewing your previously entered answers
view_only_mode.description: To modify these answers, you need to start a new journey. You can do this via the 'Restart journey' button on your dashboard.

rapport_confirmatie.title: Confirm your report generation
rapport_confirmatie.subtitle: You are about to generate your career report
rapport_confirmatie.warning_text: Once you generate your report, you can no longer modify your answers. You can always view them. To start over with new answers, you need to purchase a second journey.
rapport_confirmatie.info_text: Your career report will be generated based on all this information. Please verify that you have answered all questions to your satisfaction.
rapport_confirmatie.please_wait: This may take a moment. You will be redirected automatically once your report is ready.
